allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Path ''models\\behavior_classifier.pkl'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path ''models\\behavior_classifier_info.json'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path ''models\\*.png'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Cleaned old model files''")
Bash(powershell -Command "if \(Test-Path ''nul''\) { Remove-Item ''nul'' -Force; Write-Host ''Deleted nul file'' } else { Write-Host ''nul file not found'' }")
